message: Let's split it 80-20, a fair start!
You're starting strong, I'll try to counter!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still looking for more!
You're not giving me enough, I'll try to squeeze more out of you!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not giving up!
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time
I'm getting closer to my target, but I still want more!
I'm getting serious, let's meet in the middle
